name: WindChecker
0:
”Alexa, ask Wind Checker if we can go sailing in Seattle tomorrow”
”Can we go sailing in Sausalito on Tuesday”
”Alexa open Wind Checker”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: wind checker
des:
This skill will check the windspeed at a given place for a given time and provide a recommendation. Please leave a review and let me know how you would improve the skill. 

Make sure to check local sailing conditions before going out on the water. Wind Checker is providing a recommendation based on Open Weather Maps weather data and is not responsible for your actions.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
